title: Alumni
heading: Our alumni - our brand ambassadors - who help us hire great talent, give us regular feedback, miss us a lot and visit us often. Basically they didn't leave. They just stopped working with us.

member.name: Chetan Kothari
member.blurb: Likes to code. and many more ...

cta.heading: Train people well enough so they can leave, treat them well enough so they don't want to.
cta.content: Hunting for the rest of our alumni since most of them have fled the country.
